text: Michael is the posthumous album by the American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson. It was released in 2010. Eight of the album's ten songs were written by Jackson. Jackson died in 2009 and will.i.am said before the album's release that the album should not be released. ==Critical response== Rolling Stone gave the album three out of five stars. ==Track listing== 1\. "Hold My Hand" (featuring Akon) 2\. "Hollywood Tonight" 3\. "Keep Your Head Up" 4\. "(I Like) The Way You Love Me" 5\. "Monster" (featuring 50 Cent) 6\. "Best of Joy" 7\. "Breaking News" 8\. "(I Can't Make It) Another Day" (featuring Lenny Kravitz) 9\. "Behind the Mask" 10\. "Much Too Soon" ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Michael Jackson albums
title: Michael (Michael Jackson album)
